sentences.sCn: 他们低估了敌人的力量。

sentences.sContent: Grace:Well, % it seems that we underestimated the costs. According to the factory, it will cost about eight percent more than initially projected.
sentences.sContent_eng: Grace:Well, % it seems that we underestimated the costs. According to the factory, it will cost about eight percent more than initially projected.
sentences.sCn: 葛蕾丝：看样子我们似乎低估了成本。根据制造厂商的说法，成本会比原先计划的还高出百分之八。 。
